description:
Attorneys Andrew D. Rahaim and Sheldon S. Saints are the partners behind our Newark law firm, Rahaim & Saints, LLP. Since the founding of our firm in 1993, we have worked to build a reputation as a leader in New Castle County and throughout the state of Delaware. Thanks to our diligence and dedication to providing personalized service, clients from throughout the state turn to us for assistance with the following:

•         Personal injury, including motor vehicle accidents, product and premises liability, animal attacks, wrongful death and workers' compensation

•         Family law, including divorce, property division, child custody and support, fathers' and grandparents' rights, prenuptial agreements and guardianships

•         Criminal law, including defense against traffic violations, driving under the influence, property crimes, violent crimes, sex offenses and white collar crimes

•         Bankruptcy, including Chapter 7 and Chapter 13, foreclosure prevention and bankruptcy alternatives

Whether your legal need is the result of an accident or arrest or a family or financial challenge, you can put your trust in the experienced attorneys at the law firm of Rahaim & Saints, LLP. If you would like to discover why so many of your neighbors have turned to our firm for help for more than 20 years, you can do so by taking advantage of our offer for a free initial consultation at our Newark law office.

We are a debt relief agency. We help people file for bankruptcy relief under the U.S. Bankruptcy Code.
